name: Carbon Footprint Solution
summary: Smart Tradzt provides innovative End-to-End Carbon Footprint and Decarbonisation Solution  by comprehensively covering various GHG emission reporting Use Cases such as Corporate Carbon Footprint (scope 1,2,3) for Stock Exchange compliance reporting and Industry Specific Reporting (e.g. Oil & Gas, Metal), Product Carbon Footprint (PCF), CBAM and Regulatory Reporting (e.g. for carbon tax)
